body:
Comment 7: 
Yes, I experienced it today. I wanted to find out about a detail of encoding/gob and
instead I got distracting log messages. That's why I filed this issue. It is nice that
the example was fixed, but what if we shipped Go 1.2 with this? Fixing it would
certainly not rise to the level we have set for issuing point releases in the new faster
model. Would we really want everyone who ever wants to lookup something about
encoding/gob using godoc to be told about this inconsequential example for the next six
months?
